wikipedia_page.main: George Rowe (born 23 August 1968) is a former Scottish professional footballer who played as a centre-back for Clydebank, Arbroath, Queen of the South and Stirling Albion.

response: Included amongst his time at Queen of the South, Eadie was joint manager along with George Rowe. The management of the pair helped turn round a difficult first season, thanks in large part to the performances of then youngsters Jamie McAllister and David Lilley.
*George Rowe (footballer) (born 1968), Scottish footballer and manager, mainly with Queen of the South
*George Rowe (printmaker) (1796–1864), Cheltenham printmaker, lithographer and businessman
